extremezone already made a torrent. It ceased to exist a while after he posted it.

But it is stable nonetheless. Look around and you can still find it elsewhere. (He gets his content elsewhere, you can find it easily enough.)

azaq318 is cool too, but I bet most of these torrents cease to exist just as fast as extremezone's torrent due to Rockstar BS police. Do not fear. They cannot win this game against the entire world like they keep trying.

You will get to play the game and see if it is worthy of purchase before you cough up the cash they demand.

Do not be dissuaded. If you endure the BS police you will get your chance to see if it is worthy of purchase. :)
